objects.text:
• Authentic Monogram Embossed Leather
• Iconic Green and Red Web Stripe
• Premium Cream Leather Exterior
• Elegant Structured Silhouette

product_details.name: Luxurious Gucci Signature Boston Bag - Classic Elegance Meets Modern Style
product_details.description:
• Authentic Gucci monogram pattern embossed leather construction
• Iconic green and red web stripe detail with antique brass GG logo
• Premium cream/ivory colored leather exterior
• Durable dual top handles with metallic hardware
• Spacious main compartment with secure zip closure
• Distinctive quilted pattern design throughout
• Perfect size for daily essentials and travel
• Signature Gucci craftsmanship and attention to detail
• Versatile design suitable for both casual and formal occasions
• Includes branded hardware fixtures and finishings
• Elegant structured silhouette maintains its shape
• Part of the prestigious Gucci heritage collection

banner_details:
The banner showcases a premium fashion product with a luxurious layout suited for upscale branding. It features a cream-colored background with elegant double-line border frames, curved line elements, and subtle grid overlays. The title, composed of two prominent stacked text elements ("heading_1" and "heading_2"), is set in a bold serif font and uses a deep brown color to command attention. Just beneath it, the "subheading" in crimson red adds contrast and emphasis. A short horizontal line ("decorative_line") delivers a visual break before a list of features in "description". The "price" is highlighted in a bold type next to the product image. A prominent CTA button ("cta_button") in red with white "cta" text invites immediate action. The right side balances the layout with a cream-colored handbag and floral elements, contributing to an elegant and luxurious aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F5F1ED` (Background)
- Deep Brown: `#8B4513` (Titles and Price)
- Crimson Red: `#BF0F1E` (Subheading & CTA Button)
- Sand Gold: `#BEA27B` (Borders and Accents)
- Charcoal Gray: `#555555` (Description text)
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF` (CTA text, frame highlight)
product_color: The product image features a luxury handbag with a sophisticated and elegant color palette. The primary shade is a soft ivory cream (#F7F3EF), which provides a neutral backdrop. A rich forest green (#1C3A29) and deep burgundy red (#7B1E22) stripe runs centrally, adding bold contrast. Gold accents (#C49A6C) on the clasp and hardware infuse luxury and highlight the bag’s premium branding. Subtle shadows and gradients deepen the ivory tone, giving texture and depth without overpowering the design. The pale rose (#EBD9D4) and soft green (#6A7B5C) of the flowers at the base complement the handbag delicately. This palette balances elegance, class, and visual distinction.
